name: justbuntu os
short_description:
justbuntu 13.04 x64 (GPLv2)
by justin brown 7/5/2013
Latest version: v.1.2 

justbuntu 13.04 strives for simplicity, elegance, and ease of  use. Justbuntu is  an out-of-the-box working operating system perfect for the first time user and seasoned pro alike. No tweaking necessary.  

You can install or run justbuntu live. The choice is yours.

root = root
password = toor

(sorry this is a quick description, it is late and I am very tired. I will update with more details at a later date.)
justbuntu was built using the ubuntu minimal install cd for a clean environment  with gnome 3.6.3.1 and all the essential software for daily use.
